trans-unit.source: Represents a menu on a Ribbon tab or on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 表示功能区选项卡或 Microsoft Office 菜单上的菜单。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio creates a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu> object when you drag a **Menu** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 将创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu>对象拖动时**菜单**控件从**Office 功能区控件**选项卡**工具箱**拖动到功能区设计器。

trans-unit.source: You can create a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu> at run time by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonMenu%2A> method of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu>通过使用在运行时<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory.CreateRibbonMenu%2A>方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory>对象。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to access the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> object:
trans-unit.target: 可通过两种方法来访问 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonFactory> 对象：

trans-unit.source: By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class.
trans-unit.target: 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Common Tasks
trans-unit.target: 常规任务

trans-unit.source: The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于常见任务的成员。

trans-unit.source: All of these tasks can be performed at design time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在设计时执行所有这些任务。

trans-unit.source: Some of these tasks can be performed at run time only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 可以在运行时只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前，或者在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前执行其中的一些任务。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Task
trans-unit.target: 任务

trans-unit.source: Member
trans-unit.target: 成员

trans-unit.source: Display an image on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 在菜单上显示图像。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also reuse images that appear in built-in Ribbon controls.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以使用内置的功能区控件中显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> to the ID of a built-in Microsoft Office image that you want to display as the icon for the menu.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>为你想要显示为菜单的图标的内置 Microsoft Office 映像的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Change the size of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 更改菜单的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property to the value you want.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>属性设置为所需的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, for a large menu, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于大型的菜单中，将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: Change the size of items in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 更改菜单中的项的大小。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> property to the value you want.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>属性设置为所需的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, to display larger items, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要显示较大的项目，将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: Enable changes to the menu at run time (for example, to enable controls to be added to the menu at run time).
trans-unit.target: 在运行时 （例如，若要使控件能够在运行时添加到菜单） 启用对菜单的更改。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 将 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> 属性设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Access the controls in the menu, add controls to the menu, or remove controls from the menu.
trans-unit.target: 访问菜单中的控件、 将控件添加到菜单上，或从菜单中删除控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Items%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Items%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Add a menu to the Microsoft Office Menu, a group, or to another control that can contain menus.
trans-unit.target: 将菜单添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单上，一个组，或可以包含菜单的另一个控件。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu> to the `Items` property of the Microsoft Office Menu, group, or control.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu>到`Items`的 Microsoft Office 菜单、 组或控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add and populate a sub-menu to an existing menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何添加和在运行时填充到现有菜单子菜单。

trans-unit.source: For a richer example that updates controls at run-time and involves getting data from the AdventureWorks sample database using Language-Integrated Queries (LINQ), see [Walkthrough: Updating the Controls on a Ribbon at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关的更丰富的示例，更新在运行时的控件，包括从使用语言集成查询 (LINQ) 的 AdventureWorks 示例数据库中获取数据，请参阅[演练： 更新在运行时功能区上的控件](/visualstudio/vsto/walkthrough-updating-the-controls-on-a-ribbon-at-run-time.md)。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a menu to the group.
trans-unit.target: 向组添加一个菜单。

trans-unit.source: Set the **(Name)** property of the menu to `CustomerMenu`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**（名称）**到的菜单属性`CustomerMenu`。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Label** property of the menu to **Customers**.
trans-unit.target: 设置**标签**到的菜单属性**客户**。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**动态**到的菜单属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add and remove controls on the menu at run time after the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 这样，在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中之后，就可以在运行时添加和删除菜单上的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置菜单的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c> that represents the size of the menu.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c>表示菜单的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if the menu is nested in another menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单嵌套在另一个菜单，则此属性无效。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property of a nested menu is always set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>嵌套菜单的属性始终设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular`。

trans-unit.source: To make a nested menu appear larger, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> property of the parent menu to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 若要使嵌套的菜单，看起来更大，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>到父菜单的属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears on the current menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前菜单上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 在菜单上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The description appears when the current menu is nested in another menu or split button, and the `ItemSize` property of the parent menu or split button is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 在当前菜单嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮，描述将显示与`ItemSize`父菜单或拆分按钮的属性设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the menu can be modified at run time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可在运行时修改菜单。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the menu can be modified at run time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可在运行时修改菜单，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property to `true` if you want to add controls to the menu at run time, after the Ribbon is loaded by the Microsoft Office application.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>属性`true`如果想要在运行时，功能区加载由 Microsoft Office 应用程序后将控件添加到菜单。

trans-unit.source: For menus that you add to the Ribbon at design time, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property can be set only before the Ribbon loads.
trans-unit.target: 对于在设计时添加到功能区菜单<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>只能在功能区加载之前，才可以设置属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在菜单上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that is displayed on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个在菜单上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 建议的图像格式是 PNG，因为 PNG 格式的图像支持通过其 alpha 通道的透明度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A> properties are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>属性会被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性提供更好地控制比其他两个属性，因为每次对控件进行更新时，图像对象被发送到 Office 应用程序会比较慢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> event handler to identify an image for the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> 事件处理程序中标识菜单的图像。

trans-unit.source: The name that you can use in the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> event handler to identify an image for the menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个名称，该名称可用于在 <see cref="E:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage" /> 事件处理程序中标识菜单的图像。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A> property identifies an image that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>属性标识由控件显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Office 应用程序检索此映像从你的解决方案一次，以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可以设置仅在设计时，因为它标识的图像加载期间<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> 时将引发一次每个映像名称将显示功能区。

trans-unit.source: After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property.
trans-unit.target: 之后，无法使用此属性更改控件图像。

trans-unit.source: To load the image, add code to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要加载的映像，将代码添加到<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.OfficeRibbon.LoadImage>事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> and set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A> property of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs> object to the image that you want to load.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.ImageName%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>并设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs.Image%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonLoadImageEventArgs>到想要加载的映像的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if either the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property or the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>显示属性，因为 Office 应用程序将检索映像你解决方案仅在首次从功能区。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of controls that are on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取菜单上的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of controls that are on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 菜单上的控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: To add a Ribbon control to a menu at run time, create an instance of the control, and then add the new control to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要在运行时，功能区控件添加到的菜单，创建该控件的实例，并添加到新控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If you want to do this after the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要执行此操作后功能区加载到 Office 应用程序，则必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you add controls to a menu by using the Ribbon Designer, Visual Studio automatically adds the controls to the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Items%2A> property of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用功能区设计器可将控件添加到菜单中，在 Visual Studio 会自动添加到控件<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Items%2A>菜单的属性。

trans-unit.source: You try to add, remove, or replace a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> to this collection after the Ribbon is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 加载功能区后，可尝试在此集合中添加、移除或替换 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the controls on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置菜单上控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c> that represents the size of the controls on the menu.
trans-unit.target: A <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize</c>表示菜单上的控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeRegular</c>。

trans-unit.source: To enlarge controls that are on the menu, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A> property of the parent menu to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 若要放大菜单上的控件，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ItemSize%2A>到父菜单的属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: To change the size of the menu, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改菜单的大小，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when controls or nested menus are loaded into the current menu at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时将控件或嵌套菜单加载到当前菜单中时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised the first time the user expands the menu.
trans-unit.target: 首次用户展开菜单时，将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: If you modify the controls in the menu at run time, this event is also raised the first time the user expands the menu after you add a control or remove a control.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时修改菜单中的控件，此事件也会引发用户展开菜单上，将控件添加或移除的控件之后的第一个时间。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only when the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 将引发此事件仅当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Dynamic%2A>属性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard access key of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置菜单的键盘访问键。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the keyboard access key of the menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示菜单的键盘访问键。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须包含 1 到 3 个字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: All characters should be upper case.
trans-unit.target: 所有字符应都为大写形式。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 当你按下 ALT 键时，键提示将显示在功能区上。

trans-unit.source: If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果内置控件或从其他加载项，则与键提示中你快捷键提示相冲突，Microsoft Office 可能自动分配不冲突快捷键提示值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用键盘来使用功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置菜单所显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that is displayed by the menu.
trans-unit.target: 菜单所显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: To hide the label, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowLabel%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏标签，设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowLabel%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image to display on the menu, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在菜单上显示的图像。

trans-unit.source: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this menu.
trans-unit.target: 作为此菜单图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>属性标识由控件显示 Office 图标。

trans-unit.source: The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon.
trans-unit.target: 属性值是一个字符串，标识`imageMso`所选图标的值。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at design time or at run time.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时或在运行时，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时中更新此属性，将更新控件的外观，以反映更改。

trans-unit.source: For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760).
trans-unit.target: 有关的列表`imageMso`值，请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序： 图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略此属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A> property, because the images are cached in the Office application.
trans-unit.target: 标识的图像<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>属性可以由标识的图像以外会稍微快一些加载<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>属性，因为这些图像缓存在 Office 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property must be `true` for the control to display the image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性必须为`true`要显示图像的控件。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当你将设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在设计时，Visual Studio 将自动设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> property at run time, you must set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A> property to `true` in your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>属性在运行时，你必须设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ShowImage%2A>属性`true`在代码中。

trans-unit.source: The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a menu.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 图标分配到的菜单。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，必须首先执行以下步骤：

trans-unit.source: Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project.
trans-unit.target: 添加**功能区 （可视化设计器）**项到 Office 项目。

trans-unit.source: Add a group to the custom tab.
trans-unit.target: 将组添加到自定义选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Add a menu to the group.
trans-unit.target: 向组添加一个菜单。

trans-unit.source: Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 设置**动态**到的菜单属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the menu, if the menu is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置菜单的位置（如果该菜单在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" /> that represents the position of the menu, if the menu is on the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonPosition" />，表示菜单的位置（如果该菜单在 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

trans-unit.source: This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时仅在某些情况下，可以设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Position%2A> property has no effect when the menu is placed on a Ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Position%2A>属性时的菜单放置在功能区选项卡上没有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户将指针移到菜单上方时显示的提示文本。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.
trans-unit.target: 用户将指针移到菜单上方时显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A> value must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A>值必须少于 1024年个字符的长度。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A> property is set, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A> value appears as the title of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A>设置属性，<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A>值将显示的标题为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the menu is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与菜单关联的图像是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the image that is associated with the menu is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果与该菜单关联的图像可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>, or <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A> property at design time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性自动设置为`true`如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.Image%2A>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ImageName%2A>，或<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.OfficeImageId%2A>在设计时属性。

trans-unit.source: This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: 此属性自动设置为`true`如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`在设计时或运行的时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the menu is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示菜单的标签是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the label for the menu is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单的标签可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is always `true` if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A> property to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终是`true`如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ControlSize%2A>属性`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用户将指针移到菜单上时显示的多行提示文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains multiline tip text.
trans-unit.target: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string must be less than 1024 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 字符串必须是长度小于 1024年个字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A> appears under <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A> text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A>下显示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A>文本。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A>, the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A> enables line breaks in the string.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.ScreenTip%2A>、<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonMenu.SuperTip%2A>字符串中的启用分行符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title that is displayed when the user expands a menu that is added to the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标题，此标题在用户展开添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的菜单时显示。

trans-unit.source: The title that is displayed when the user expands a menu that is added to the Microsoft Office Menu.
trans-unit.target: 此标题在用户展开添加到 Microsoft Office 菜单的菜单时显示。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if the menu is on a Ribbon tab.
trans-unit.target: 如果菜单是功能区选项卡上，则此属性无效。
